channel.title: [MISC] Infection (CANNED BECAUSE OF NEW PROJECT UNDERWAY)
channel.description:
## Welcome *No Cohost Added.*
### Gameplay There is a hunger stat that decreases by 10% every day. There is a thirst stat that decreases by 20% every day. There is a health stat. There is an Infectivity stat that is unknown unless scanned. Increases by 10% every day. There is a Shop system. Everyone has the same goal. More coming (iPad 1%)
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed on your death. Can contain upto 1000 words.
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want.
Players: 1. player1 - Leader - Alive 2. player2 - Alive 3. player3 - Alive 4. player4 - Alive 5. player5 - Alive 6. player6 - Alive 7. player7 - Alive 8. player8 - Alive 9. player9 - Alive 10. player10 - Alive 11. player11 - Alive 12. player12 - Alive 13. player13 - Alive 14. player14 - Alive 15. player15 - Alive 16. player16 - Alive
[details="SHOP CATALOGUE"] **Canned Food (10 coins) -** Fills your hunger stat by 1% for every percent consumed. **Water bottle (10 coins) -** Fills your thirst stat by 1% for every percent consumed. **Bandage (10 coins) -** Fills your health stat by 10% when consumed. **First Aid Kit (30 coins) -** Fills your health stat by 40% when consumed. **Suppressant (35 coins) -** Reduces your Infectivity stat by 15% when consumed. Can cure low infection. **Rope (40 coins) -** Can be used to lock a player in their room, preventing visits to them and by them. Can select yourself, but if self-targeted you can take it off. **Knife (50 coins) -** Can be used to attack a player, killing them. **Syringe (60 coins) -** Reduces your Infectivity stat by 35% when consumed. Can cure low infection. [/details]

item.title: [MISC] Infection (CANNED BECAUSE OF NEW PROJECT UNDERWAY)
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Welcome

No Cohost Added.

Gameplay

There is a hunger stat that decreases by 10% every day.
There is a thirst stat that decreases by 20% every day.
There is a health stat.
There is an Infectivity stat that is unknown unless scanned. Increases by 10% every day.
There is a Shop system.
Everyone has the same goal.
More coming (iPad 1%)

Journals

Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed on your death. Can contain upto 1000 words.

To Join

To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want.

Players:

  1. player1 - Leader - Alive
  2. player2 - Alive
  3. player3 - Alive
  4. player4 - Alive
  5. player5 - Alive
  6. player6 - Alive
  7. player7 - Alive
  8. player8 - Alive
  9. player9 - Alive
  10. player10 - Alive
  11. player11 - Alive
  12. player12 - Alive
  13. player13 - Alive
  14. player14 - Alive
  15. player15 - Alive
  16. player16 - Alive
SHOP CATALOGUE

Canned Food (10 coins) - Fills your hunger stat by 1% for every percent consumed.
Water bottle (10 coins) - Fills your thirst stat by 1% for every percent consumed.
Bandage (10 coins) - Fills your health stat by 10% when consumed.
First Aid Kit (30 coins) - Fills your health stat by 40% when consumed.
Suppressant (35 coins) - Reduces your Infectivity stat by 15% when consumed. Can cure low infection.
Rope (40 coins) - Can be used to lock a player in their room, preventing visits to them and by them. Can select yourself, but if self-targeted you can take it off.
Knife (50 coins) - Can be used to attack a player, killing them.
Syringe (60 coins) - Reduces your Infectivity stat by 35% when consumed. Can cure low infection.

Read full topic
item.source: [MISC] Infection (CANNED BECAUSE OF NEW PROJECT UNDERWAY)
